channel.title: Business English on 42th openheart
channel.description: Recent content in Business English on 42th openheart

item.title: I am a freshman
item.description: Step out of my comfort zone Sentence We have a new team member onboard from 1st Dec 2020. Please join me in welcoming Kris to Infor and give them your great support in every way possible! Welcome to the team! Thank you. It is my honor to be able to join our team. Don’t spin your wheels! 这里的spin your wheels(cambridge.org) 可以理解为"to waste time doing things that achieve nothing” You’re in good company.
